head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden, ¶ 12/2/73 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ In accordance with the request, conveyed by your communication of the 8th instance, ¶ I commenced at once the elaboration of a return of the present stock ...

div.p: K73/2674, unit 750, VPRS 44/P inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
In accordance with the request, conveyed by your communication of the 8th instance,
Letter not found; in M to D. Gillies, 8 February 1873, M dated Gillies's communication to 7 February. I commenced at once the elaboration of a return of the present stock of plants in the two nurseries of the botanic Garden, and I shall have the honor of submitting it to you to morrow.
See M to D. Gilles, 13 February 1873. I beg to draw respectfully attention to the fact, that your wish for such a return was not brought to my cognizance as Director until the evening of the 8th inst (Saturday) through any ministerial communication with myself.
I have the honor to be, Sir, your obedient servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The honorable the Acting Minister of the Lands Department.
